Class 21

Jan 02, 2018 - Tue

View On Github Download class file

constant and static properties and method

class Person {
  const CITY = 'Feni';
  public static $division = 'Chittagong';
  public $first_name;
  public $last_name;
  public function fullName () {
    return "{$this->first_name} {$this->last_name}'s mobile phone";
  }
}
echo Person::$division;
echo Person::CITY;

string interpolation in php

return "{$this->first_name} {$this->last_name}'s mobile phone";

magic method in php

magic method in php works like a magic. Itâ€™s invoked behind the scene. __construct function invoked when we instantiate a class.

class Person {
  public function __construct ($first_name, $last_name) {
    $this->first_name = $first_name;
    $this->last_name = $last_name;
  }
  public $first_name;
  public $last_name;
  public function fullName () {
    return $this->first_name . ' ' . $this->last_name;
  }
}
$arafat = new Person('arafat', 'rahman');
echo $arafat->fullName();
